title: Demultiplex
description: Demultiplexes a reads file into individual reads files, using Ultraplex. FastQC will be run on all the demultiplexed reads file produced, but otherwise no additional analysis will be performed on them.

annotation.description: A CSV or XLSX file describing the contents of the multiplexed reads file.

multiplexed_fastq.description: A multiplexed reads file containing reads from multiple experiments, distinguishable by barcode sequence.
